song_lyrics: Jenā mukhmā Shrījīnu nām chhe re evā,
Jenā haiyāmā Shrījīno vās chhe re,
Evā Pramukh Swāmīnī jay jay jay
Bāḷkonu vahāl ane juvānonu jom chhe,
E ja vaḍīlonu vahālu nām chhe re. 1
Enī ānkhomā jonārā Shyām chhe re. 2
E to Upanishadno sār chhe re. 3
E to māyāne tarvānu nāv chhe re. 4
title: Jenā mukhmā Shrījīnu nām chhe re evā Pramukh Swāmīnī

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-3020: Nitin Kariya

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
